title: Annan Enna Thambi Enna Lyrics Dharma Durai
stanzas:
Annan Enna Thambi Enna Song Lyrics Dharma Durai(1991)
#Ilaiyaraja #KJYesudas

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna
solladi enaku padhilai

nandri kondra ullangalai
kandu kandu vendha pinbu
ennadi enakku velai

nambi nambi vembi vembi
ondrumillai endra pinbu
uravu kidakku podi
indha unmaiyai
kandavan gyaani  (2)

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna

aasayil naan vaitha
paasathil nesathil
vandhadhingu vedhanaiyum
sodhanaiyum thaan.

nenjam vendhadhadi
sogathinil thaan

paambuku paal vaithu
naan seitha paavathil
vandhhathingu
konjamalla nanjamalladi

endhan nenjamingu
nenjam alladi

Car-ukkum paerukkum
thaerukkum aasai enna
nerukku nerindri
eithidum mosam enna

oorukku niyayangal
sollidum vesam enna
unmaiyai kondra pin
nenjuku needhi enna

pogum paadhai thavaraanal
podum kanakkum thavaraagum
oh oh oh.

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna
solladi enaku padhilai

nandri kondra ullangalai
kandu kandu vendha pinbu
ennadi enakku velai

nambi nambi vembi vembi
ondrumillai endra pinbu
uravu kidakku podi
indha unmaiyai
kandavan gyaani  (2)

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna

thandhaiyil solindru
mandhiram thaan endru
kandaddhadi
pillai enthan
unmai ullame

enthan ullam engum
anbu vellame.

sondhathil bandhathil
mosathil sogathil
vandhu nindru
unmaithani indru
unarnthen

idhai kandu kandu
indru thelindhen

pattadhu pattadhu
en manam pattadhadi
suttadhu suttadhu
sattigal suttadhadi

vittadhu vittadhu
kaigalum vittadhadi
kottudhu kottudhu
niyanamum kottudhadi

vaanam paarthu
parakkaadhe.
boomiyil pirandhaai
marakkaathe.
oh oh oh..

Annan enna thambi enna
sondham enna bandham enna
solladi enaku padhilai

nandri kondra ullangalai
kandu kandu vendha pinbu
ennadi enakku velai

nambi nambi vembi vembi
ondrumillai endra pinbu
uravu kidakku podi
indha unmaiyai
kandavan gyaani  (2)
